comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: James E. Gaffney (March 7, 1868 - August 17, 1932) was the owner of the Boston Braves of the National League from 1912 through 1915. In 1912, he purchased the club from William Hepburn Russell's estate. In 1915, he sold the franchise to Percy Haughton. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_E._Gaffney
